mods.abstract: Female adult, China shoulder head on cloth body, china forearms and lower limbs with molded boots, molded and painted features and hair, blonde, jointed at shoulders and hips, linen underwear trimmed with tucks and lace, pleats skirt mid-calf length, high neck long jacket with nine buttons, big self fabric bow at back of jacket, all, hand and machine-made. Accompanying information describes that the body of the doll is covered with cloth pages from children books. Flags of many nations is design of cloth. Many pages had a,b,c, letters used in the design.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
